# [Interview #1125: Changing Hands, AZ, Entry #20](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1125#20)

#### Question

Have you accidentally written any other books?

#### Brandon Sanderson

He tried writing AOLâ€™s sequel but it was hard. It is easier to start new. Practice writing he does a lot to get used to different genres, but he doesn't really accidentally write things.
